channel.title: How do you get screenshots of your server?for a client or webclient?another ques
channel.description: how do you take screenshots of your server on a client or on a webclient,and my compiler aint working some1 send me a working one..?

item.dc:creator: @Runescape_Project Runescape Project

well you can make an account on www.photobucket.com or use www.imageshack.us but photobucket is better.

item.title: How do you get screenshots of your server?for a client or webclient?another ques
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

When playng it, press Print screen SysRq. It’s near the backpace key and next to the F12 key.
Once you’ve done that, open Paint and press control + v.
